title: The Most Important Stats to Know for the 2020 Season | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin is joined by The Ringer's Danny Kelly and The Athletic’s Sheil Kapadia to break down the stats you should know heading into the 2020 season. They talk about the Patriots defense being overrated, Kyler Murray’s looming breakout season, and the underrated Colts.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly and Sheil Kapadia


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
